sequenceDiagram
    participant Client
    participant Server
    Client->>Server: Request
    Server-->>Client: Response
    Client->>Server: Acknowledge
---
┌────────┐     ┌────────┐
│ Client │     │ Server │
└────┬───┘     └────┬───┘
     │              │
     │ Request      │
     ├─────────────►│
     │              │
     │ Response     │
     │◄┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┈┤
     │              │
     │ Acknowledge  │
     ├─────────────►│
     │              │
